column2: Spire Inc. operates as a public utility holding company, which provides natural gas service through its utility operations while engaging in non-regulated activities. The company is headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri and currently employs 3,536 full-time employees. The firm has two business segments, which include gas utility and gas marketing. The gas utility segment includes the regulated operations Spire Missouri, Spire Alabama, Spire Gulf and Spire Mississippi. The gas marketing segment includes Spire Marketing Inc. (Spire Marketing), a wholly owned subsidiary engaged in the marketing of natural gas and related activities on a non-regulated basis. Mobile Gas and Willmut Gas are subsidiaries of EnergySouth.
